title: Assistant Manager Job at Macden Communications Limited
content:
Macden Communications Limited is into the supply and distribution of beverages and is a major supplier and distributor for Nigerian Breweries Limited and International Breweries Limited.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Manager
Job Location: Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Supervision and leadership
	Operational management
	Customer services
	Adminstrative tasks
	Fnancial oversight
	Goal achievement
	Training and development
	Problem solving


Requirements
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Candidates should possess an OND / HND / B.Sc with 3 - 5 years of work experience. 
	Interested applicants are to apply from within Sagamu and its environs.


Salary
N75,000 - N80,000 Monthly.

Mehod of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: patricia_asemota@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note 


	For further inquiries, Call: 09063461304.
	The working hours and days are from Mondays to Saturdays from 8am to 6pm and on public holidays.
